Photographic Associate.responsibilities: Managed photographic equipment and assisted in capturing images. Responsible for post-processing and digital editing.

Pharmaceutical Delivery Driver.responsibilities: Orchestrated daily delivery routes and managed pharmaceutical stock replenishments. Ensured healthcare-compliant storage and documentation.

Tour Coordinator.responsibilities: Crafted bespoke tour itineraries and coordinated with local agents. Managed customer relations and real-time crises like missed flights.

Integrated Mechanical Systems Technician.responsibilities: Installed and maintained diverse mechanical systems. Conducted preventive maintenance checks and advised customers.
